alert.note: Alert for Fillmore; Houston (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 6:35AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Allamakee, northeastern Winneshiek, southwestern Houston and southeastern Fillmore Counties through 715 AM CDT... At 634 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mabel, or 15 miles north of Decorah, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Spring Grove around 650 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Hanover, County 16 And 4 Corners Drive, Hesper, Highlandville, Quandahl, Riceford, Wilmington, Dorchester, Sattre and Newhouse. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
